What\'s new with Field Nation

We\'ve started the redesign process on the work order details view by making it easier to add items with a floating action button and by moving attachments to the bottom of the view. We have also addressed a lot of the reported bugs with the Android O release on top of fixing other reported bugs.

What we added:
  • A floating action button to make it easier to add items to a work order
What we changed:
  • Moved attachments out of the top tabs and to the bottom of the work order details view to get us one step closer to a complete redesign
Bugs we fixed:
  • Crashes on Android O
  • Issues around dialogs and actions not working for larger work orders
  • Check in/out locations being off
  • Crash on empty work order lists
